post.description: Please authenticate with a user password.

parameters.name: grant_type
parameters.description: The type of credentials used to authorize the request for an access token. (Use "password")

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Email address of the user. (Use guest@boldbi.com for this demo API)

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password of the user. (Use Demo759! for this demo API)

400.description: Email address is empty
The content of the request body is missing or incomplete

406.description: The content of the request body is invalid

get.summary: Get a User by Email or Username

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Username or email address of the user

get.description: Retrieve the list of group details for the specific user.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: User ID or Email address of the user.

200.description: List of user's groups was retrieved successfully.

get.description: Download the CSV template in order to import the CSV users.

417.description: Failed to download CSV template file

post.description: Please add the list of users using the CSV file.

parameters.name: apiCsvUserImportRequest
parameters.description: Details passed to add the CSV of users.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete

get.description: Retrieve the list of group details.

200.description: List of groups has been retrieved successfully.

post.description: Add the list of users to the specific group.

200.description: User(s) added to the group successfully.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete

417.description: Failed to add user in to group

delete.description: Delete the list of users from the specific group.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete

417.description: Failed to delete user from group

200.description: List of child dashboards retrieved successfully

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete

post.description:
Administrators can add a new permission to a specific user by providing the permission details.

To add a specific permission, you must provide the item ID (Category Id, Schedule Id, and Dashboard Id) for the permission entity (SpecificCategory, SpecificSchedule, and SpecificDashboard).

parameters.name: apiUserPermissionAdd
parameters.description: Details about the permissions that were passed will be added to the specified user id.

200.description: User permission has been added successfully

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete

406.description: The content of the request body is invalid

get.description: Administrators can obtain the list of permissions for the specific user.

200.description: List of user permissions has been retrieved successfully.

400.description: Invalid user ID.

delete.description: Administrators have the ability to delete a specific user's permission.

400.description: Permission id is empty

post.description:
Administrators can add a new permission to the specific group by providing permission details.

To add a specific permission, you must provide the item ID (Category Id, Schedule Id, and Dashboard Id) for the permission entity (SpecificCategory, SpecificSchedule, and SpecificDashboard).

parameters.name: apiGroupPermissionAdd
parameters.description: Details about the permissions that were passed will be added to the specified group ID.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete

406.description: The content of the request body is invalid

get.description: Administrators can obtain the list of permissions for the specific group.

200.description: List of group permissions has been retrieved successfully.

delete.description: Administrators have the ability to delete specific group permissions.

400.description: Permission id is empty

post.description: Users who have create access for categories can add a new category.

parameters.name: apiCategoryAdd
parameters.description: Details about the passed category will be added.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete

406.description: The content of the request body is invalid

put.description: Users who have write access to categories can update an existing category.

parameters.name: apiCategoryUpdate
parameters.description: Details about the category that has been passed will be updated to the specified category ID.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete

406.description: The content of the request body is invalid

get.description: Retrieve the list of public dashboards for the current user.

200.description: List of public dashboards was retrieved successfully.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete

get.description: Retrieve a list of favorite dashboards for the current user.

200.description: List of favorite dashboards was retrieved successfully.

put.description: Users who have read access to the dashboard can update the dashboard as a favorite or non-favorite.

parameters.name: apiUpdateFavorite
parameters.description: Favorite value passed will be updated to the specified dashboard id.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete

post.description:
Users who have read access to the dashboard can export it to various formats (Excel, PDF, and Image) and receive the exported dashboard as an array of bytes in response.

When exporting a multi-tabbed dashboard in image format, the response bytes must be saved in ZIP format.

parameters.name: apiExportDashboard
parameters.description: Details about the passed dashboard will be exported.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete

406.description: The content of the request body is invalid

get.description: Retrieve the respective list of items for the item types (Category, Dashboard, Datasource, and Schedule) for the current user.

200.description: List of items has been retrieved successfully.

400.description: Invalid item type

get.description: Retrieve the respective item details for the current users' item types (Category, Dashboard, Datasource, and Schedule).

400.description: Item id invalid

delete.description: Users who have delete access to the item types Category, Dashboard, Datasource, and Schedule can delete the item by providing the item ID (Category ID, Dashboard ID, Datasource ID, and Schedule ID).

400.description: Item id invalid

post.description: The current user can check whether the item (category, dashboard, datasource, schedule) already exists by providing the item name (category name, dashboard name, schedule name, datasource name) and item type (category, dashboard, datasource, schedule) in the request body.

parameters.name: apiValidateItemName
parameters.description: Details about the item that was passed will be checked.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete

token_type.description: Type of token assigned by the authorization server.

expires_in.description: The lifetime in seconds of the access token.

ApiStatus.description: Returns the status of the API.

Status.description: Returns status of the API request.

StatusMessage.description: Returns the status message from the API.

Message.description: Returns the message from the API.

Email.description: Email address of the user (Email required only in [Email required](/site-administration/account-settings/#email-required) mode).

Password.description: Password of the user (Password accepted only in [Automatic activation](/site-administration/account-settings/#automatic-activation) mode). **NOTE:** If you are using a Syncfusion Managed Cloud Server, then the password field is not required to be used.

IsActive.description: Returns true, if the user is an active user

UserStatus.description: Returns the status of the user

IsAzureAdUser.description: Returns true, if the user is added from Azure Active Directory.

UserDomain.description: Domain of the Active Directory User

ApiChildDashboard.description: Child dashboard details of the multi-dashboard

ParentId.description: Specifies the Item Id of the parent dashboard.

DashboardId.description: Specifies the Item Id of the child dashboard.

Name.description: Specifies the name of the child dashboard.

TabId.description: Specifies the tab Id of the child dashboard.

MultiTabDashboardId.description: Specifies the dashboard ID of the multi-tabbed dashboard.

DashboardId.description: Specifies the dashboard ID of the tab.

Name.description: Specifies the name of the tab.

CreatedDate.description: Date created of the item in string format.

ModifiedDate.description: Date modified of the item in string format.

IsAzureADGroup.description: Returns true, if the group is added from Azure Active Directory.

ApiDownloadCsvTemplate.description: Contains response of downloaded CSV template file.

Status.description: Returns status of the API request.

StatusMessage.description: Returns the status message from the API.

FileContent.description: Returns CSV file in array of bytes.

CsvFileContent.description: Provides the CSV file in an array of bytes.

ApiCsvUserImportResponse.description: Contains response of Csv user import

ApiStatus.description: Returns the status of the API.

Status.description: Returns status of the API request.

StatusMessage.description: Returns the status message from the API.

CsvErrorContent.description: Returns CSV file in array of bytes if the importing users find errors.

`"AllDashboards"` `"DashboardsInCategory"` `"SpecificDashboard"`
